channel.title: Changing genders?
channel.description:
Ok I'm wondering how do you change you're gender to a female? So my baby sis can actually have a girl hehe
Just a simple question but I don't see anything that has to do with changing gender....
Also what's the correct interface for a client? Someone said a solution to fixing d/c when bringing up a window (shops) is due to interface Also if I do the ::char command so I can change genders It will just d/c me
[b]Was the moparscape forums down? Cause it wouldn't let me on it until now[/b]
Thanks a lot!!!!
Check my sig ;)

item.title: Changing genders?
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Ok I’m wondering how do you change you’re gender to a female? So my baby sis can actually have a girl hehe

Just a simple question but I don’t see anything that has to do with changing gender…

Also what’s the correct interface for a client? Someone said a solution to fixing d/c when bringing up a window (shops) is due to interface Also if I do the ::char command so I can change genders It will just d/c me

Was the moparscape forums down? Cause it wouldn’t let me on it until now

Thanks a lot!!!
